00163     template< class AbstractProduct, class Id, class ConsArg,
00164              class ProductRef = AbstractProduct *,
00165              class IdComp = std::less<Id> >
00166     class Factory :boost::noncopyable {
00167     public:
00169       typedef Id              producer_id;
00171       typedef typename boost::call_traits<producer_id>::param_type id_param;
00173       typedef AbstractProduct product_type;
00175       typedef ProductRef      returned_type;
00176                      
00184       void getIds(std::list<Id> &ids) const;
00185       
00197       class producer: boost::noncopyable {
00198       public:
00204        typedef typename boost::call_traits<ConsArg>::param_type argument_type;
00209        typedef ProductRef result_type;
00210                             
00224        result_type operator()(argument_type arg) const {
00225          return produce(arg);
00226        }
00227                             
00228        void notify() {
00229          declareMe();
00230        }
00231 
00236        Id const &getId() const {
00237          return m_type;
00238        }
00239                             
00240       protected:
00251        virtual result_type produce(argument_type arg) const =0;
00252                             
00260        producer(id_param id)
00261          :m_type(id) {}
00262                             
00275        void declareMe() const {
00276          // std::cerr<<m_factory.operator->()<<".add("<<m_type<<")"<<std::endl;
00277          m_factory->add(this);
00278        }
00279                             
00286        virtual ~producer() {
00287          // std::cerr<<m_factory.operator->()<<".remove("<<m_type<<")"<<std::endl;
00288          m_factory->remove(this);
00289        }
00290                             
00291       private:
00292                             
00293        Id const              m_type;    
00294        SingletonUse<Factory> m_factory; 
00295                             
00305        producer();
00306       }; // class TREX::utils::Factory<>::producer
00307                      
00329       template<class Product>
00330       class declare :public producer {
00331       public:
00346        declare(id_param id) 
00347          :producer(id) {
00348          producer::notify();
00349        }
00350 
00351 
00356        virtual ~declare() {}
00357                             
00358       private:
00359        typename producer::result_type produce(typename producer::argument_type arg) 
00360          const {
00361          typename producer::result_type ret(new Product(arg));
00362          return ret;
00363        }
00364                             
00370        BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((boost::is_convertible<Product *,
00371                                              AbstractProduct *>::value));
00372                             
00373       }; // class TREX::utils::Factory<>::declare<>
00374                      
00391       producer const &get(id_param id) const;
00392       producer const &operator[](id_param id) const {
00393        return get(id);
00394       }
00404       bool exists(id_param id) const;
